text:
You don't want to be tired tomorrow.
It's time for you to call it a night and get some rest.

It's not like I can afford to say that.
I'm already behind schedule.

While other idols seem to be having fun and moving forward,
I'm the only one feeling stuck...

Besides, isn't the point of training camps to practice
from morning till night?
You were brought here for that purpose, right?

…Even so, it's pointless if you end up getting sick.
To see the training camp through to the end...
